lines.text: ...There's no one on the force who could've done this, right?
The only one who was here before me was Opal, and she doesn't know any magic.
A-are you accusing me of something?
I mean, there's not usually any way to tell if someone's a wizard, besides seeing them do magic.
You sure she's not just hiding something from you?
N-no! This is- these accusations- I would never!
She's tellin' the truth. Just so you know- there <c=#FF00FF>is</c> a way to check someone for magic.
It's not a test you can just administer on the street, but we've got ways. And everyone in my division's been tested.
Wait, what? I don't remember any- any test!
Well, sure. You didn't notice us doin' it. It's, whaddayacallit, <c=#FF00FF>covert.</c>
I... don't like that you can do that, but... alright.
